headline: 3 Reasons to Sell NOC and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Northrop Grumman’s 8.4% return over the past six months has outpaced the S&P 500 by 6.7%, and its stock price has climbed to $507 per share. This performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
